document.full_text: some public school parents in edgewater, florida, want a first-grade girl with life-threatening peanut allergies removed from the classroom and home-schooled, rather than deal with special rules to protect her health, a school official said.
document.title: peanut allergy stirs controversy at florida school
lines_and_colors: some public school parents in edgewater, florida, want a first-grade girl with life-threatening peanut allergies removed from the classroom and home-schooled, rather than deal with special rules to protect her health, a school official said.
